channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #Nani talked about the decades
item.description: #Nani talked about the decades-long career of #KamalHaasan and shared that the legacy he has created for himself is ‘unbreakable’ #telugucinema

item.title: #Pakistan succumbed to their f
item.description: #Pakistan succumbed to their first ever #testmatch defeat against #Bangladesh after fielding an attack, which did not contain a single frontline #spinner. via CrickIt | #Cricket #TestCricket #PakVsBan #PAKvBAN

item.title: Under Chief Minister #ArvindKe
item.description: Under Chief Minister #ArvindKejriwal's vision, #MohallaBuses will connect every corner of #Delhi. Cabinet Minister #SaurabhBhardwaj and MLA #SomnathBharti inaugurated the trial #MohallaBus on the new route from #KailashColony #MetroStation to PNB #GeetanjaliColony
